text:
We have a problem with Priority. This class is not implementing Serializable. 
In our case we are using Log4J 1.1.3 with execption (in a distrubuted 
environment) handling and pass the Priority class as a Logging priority. (is 
the exception fatal, error or just non-fatal). 

Is there a good reason for that the Priority class is nog Serialable?
creator: dvogel@springteam.nl

text: Yes, Priorities are flyweights. They need special serialization handling.
creator: ceki@apache.org
